column3: Hautdilong has something to share with you, and he can't hold it in any longer.
<If(PlayerParameter(4))>Miss<Else/>Sir</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>, there you are! Ehll Tou and I have been thinking of how we can repay you for all your help.
After much deliberation, we decided to ask Master Arvide to help us craft a bespoke item, just for you. I hope he hasn't spoiled the surprise.
When last we spoke, he said that the project was nearing completion. Perhaps he is finished by now? Oh, I do hope you like it!
I think you'll be pleasantly surprised by what Ehll Tou and I have devised for you. Master Arvide should have it ready by now─he should be at the market in the New Nest.
Ah, welcome! I take it you've spoken to Hautdilong, then. Well, here you go!
Ehll Tou was most insistent I designed this horn just so. Blow on it and the little dragon will fly to your side wheresoever you may be.
Although I suppose I can't call her little any more, eh? 'Tis only natural that as she grows, her desire to see more of the world would grow as well.

That's why she wanted you to have this. Show her every corner of the civilized world, and introduce her to people of all sort. She'll need a wide breadth of knowledge if she means to paint her kin the full picture of our kind.

When I first agreed to help Ehll Tou, I had no inkling I might be contributing to something much larger than myself. Whatever comes of her efforts in the end, I must say I'm honored to have played my small part in it. Thanks for giving me this opportunity, friend.
